alert.note: Alert for Central Walton; Holmes; North Walton; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 15 at 4:38PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Walton, Holmes and north central Washington Counties through 415 PM CDT... At 338 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near De Funiak Springs to 6 miles northwest of Bonifay. Movement was southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Chipley, De Funiak Springs, Bonifay, Eglin Air Force Base, Union, Liberty, Ponce De Leon, Caryville, Westville, Oakwood Hills, Cluster Springs, Whitehead Crossroads, Alpine Heights, Cerrogordo, Gritney, Arrant Settlement, De Funiak Spring Airport, Rock Hill, Glendale and Pleasant Ridge. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Walton; Holmes; North Walton; Washington
